00078 struct EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL EnvelopeAux {
00079     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00080     int              nreg;
00081     int              *regs;
00082     EnvelopeAux() : nreg(0) {};
00083     ~EnvelopeAux() {
00084         if (nreg>0) {
00085             delete [] regs;
00086         }
00087     };
00088 };
00089 
00090 EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00091         const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms, const string &Name,
00092         bool newindexing) :
00093     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), reg_to_inscr(0), local_start(0) {
00094     if (!G) {
00095         egsFatal("EGS_EnvelopeGeometry: base geometry must not be null\n");
00096     }
00097     g = G;
00098     g->ref();
00099     new_indexing = false;
00100     nbase = g->regions();
00101     n_in = geoms.size();
00102     nmax = 1;
00103     int nreg_inscribed = 0;
00104     if (n_in > 0) {
00105         geometries = new EGS_BaseGeometry * [n_in];
00106         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00107             geometries[j] = geoms[j];
00108             geometries[j]->ref();
00109             int nj = geometries[j]->regions();
00110             if (nj > nmax) {
00111                 nmax = nj;
00112             }
00113             nreg_inscribed += nj;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     nreg = nbase + n_in*nmax;
00117     is_convex = g->isConvex();
00118     has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00119     if (!has_rho_scaling) {
00120         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00121             if (geometries[j]->hasRhoScaling()) {
00122                 has_rho_scaling = true;
00123                 break;
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127     if (!n_in) {
00128         return;
00129     }
00130     if (newindexing) {
00131         new_indexing = true;
00132         local_start = new int [n_in];
00133         reg_to_inscr = new int [nreg_inscribed];
00134         int ir=0;
00135         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00136             int n = geometries[j]->regions();
00137             local_start[j] = nbase + ir;
00138             for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00139                 reg_to_inscr[ir++] = j;
00140             }
00141         }
00142         nreg = nbase + ir;
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 EGS_FastEnvelope::EGS_FastEnvelope(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00147                                    const vector<EnvelopeAux *> &fgeoms, const string &Name,
00148                                    int newindexing) :
00149     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), reg_to_inscr(0), local_start(0) {
00150     if (!G) {
00151         egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope: base geometry must not be null\n");
00152     }
00153     g = G;
00154     g->ref();
00155     n_in = fgeoms.size();
00156     nmax = 1;
00157     new_indexing = false;
00158     if (!n_in) {
00159         egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope: no inscribed geometries!\n");
00160     }
00161     geometries = new EGS_BaseGeometry * [n_in];
00162     nbase = g->regions();
00163     int *iaux = new int [nbase];
00164     int j;
00165     for (j=0; j<nbase; j++) {
00166         iaux[j] = 0;
00167     }
00168     int nlist = 0;
00169     int nreg_inscribed = 0;
00170     for (j=0; j<fgeoms.size(); j++) {
00171         geometries[j] = fgeoms[j]->g;
00172         geometries[j]->ref();
00173         int nj = geometries[j]->regions();
00174         nreg_inscribed += nj;
00175         if (nj > nmax) {
00176             nmax = nj;
00177         }
00178         for (int i=0; i<fgeoms[j]->nreg; i++) {
00179             int k = fgeoms[j]->regs[i];
00180             if (k >= 0 && k < nbase) {
00181                 ++iaux[k];
00182                 ++nlist;
00183             }
00184         }
00185     }
00186     n_start = new int [nbase+1];
00187     glist = new int [nlist];
00188     int ilist=0;
00189     for (j=0; j<nbase; j++) {
00190         n_start[j] = ilist;
00191         if (iaux[j] > 0) {
00192             for (int l=0; l<fgeoms.size(); l++) {
00193                 for (int i=0; i<fgeoms[l]->nreg; i++) {
00194                     int k = fgeoms[l]->regs[i];
00195                     if (k == j) {
00196                         glist[ilist++] = l;
00197                     }
00198                 }
00199             }
00200         }
00201     }
00202     n_start[nbase] = ilist;
00203     nreg = nbase + n_in*nmax;
00204     is_convex = g->isConvex();
00205     has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00206     if (!has_rho_scaling) {
00207         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00208             if (geometries[j]->hasRhoScaling()) {
00209                 has_rho_scaling = true;
00210                 break;
00211             }
00212         }
00213     }
00214     delete [] iaux;
00215     if (newindexing) {
00216         new_indexing = true;
00217         local_start = new int [n_in];
00218         reg_to_inscr = new int [nreg_inscribed];
00219         int ir=0;
00220         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00221             int n = geometries[j]->regions();
00222             local_start[j] = nbase + ir;
00223             for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00224                 reg_to_inscr[ir++] = j;
00225             }
00226         }
00227         nreg = nbase + ir;
00228     }
00229 }
00230 
00231 EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::~EGS_EnvelopeGeometry() {
00232     if (!g->deref()) {
00233         delete g;
00234     }
00235     for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00236         if (!geometries[j]->deref()) {
00237             delete geometries[j];
00238         }
00239     }
00240     delete [] geometries;
00241     if (new_indexing) {
00242         if (local_start) {
00243             delete [] local_start;
00244         }
00245         if (reg_to_inscr) {
00246             delete [] reg_to_inscr;
00247         }
00248     }
00249 }
00250 
00251 EGS_FastEnvelope::~EGS_FastEnvelope() {
00252     if (!g->deref()) {
00253         delete g;
00254     }
00255     for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00256         if (!geometries[j]->deref()) {
00257             delete geometries[j];
00258         }
00259     }
00260     delete [] geometries;
00261     delete [] n_start;
00262     delete [] glist;
00263     if (new_indexing) {
00264         if (local_start) {
00265             delete [] local_start;
00266         }
00267         if (reg_to_inscr) {
00268             delete [] reg_to_inscr;
00269         }
00270     }
00271 }

00273 void EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::printInfo() const {
00274     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00275     egsInformation(" base geometry = %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00276                    g->getType().c_str());
00277     egsInformation(" inscribed geometries:\n");
00278     for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00279                 geometries[j]->getName().c_str(),geometries[j]->getType().c_str());
00280     egsInformation(
00281         "=======================================================\n");
00282 }

00284 void EGS_FastEnvelope::printInfo() const {
00285     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00286     egsInformation(" base geometry = %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00287                    g->getType().c_str());
00288     egsInformation(" inscribed geometries:\n");
00289     for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00290                 geometries[j]->getName().c_str(),geometries[j]->getType().c_str());
00291     egsInformation(
00292         "=======================================================\n");

00296 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message1[] =
00297     "createGeometry(envelope geometry): %s\n";
00298 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message2[] =
00299     "null input?";
00300 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message3[] =
00301     "no 'base geometry' input?";
00302 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message4[] =
00303     "incorrect base geometry definition";
00304 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message5[] =
00305     "missing/incorrect 'base geometry' input";
00306 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message6[] =
00307     "createGeometry(envelope geometry): no geometry with name %s defined\n";
00308 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message7[] =
00309     "no inscirebed geometries defined?. I hope you know what you are doing";
00310 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_message8[] =
00311     "an error occured while constructing inscibed geometries";
00312 
00313 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword1[] = "base geometry";
00314 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword2[] = "geometry";
00315 static char EGS_ENVELOPEG_LOCAL eeg_keyword3[] = "inscribed geometries";
00316 
00317 extern "C" {
00318 
00319     EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00320         if (!input) {
00321             egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message2);
00322             return 0;
00323         }
00324         //
00325         // *** new indexing style
00326         //
00327         int indexing = 0;
00328         input->getInput("new indexing style",indexing);
00329         //
00330         // *** Base geometry
00331         //
00332         EGS_Input *i = input->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword1);
00333         if (!i) {
00334             egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message3);
00335             return 0;
00336         }
00337         EGS_Input *ig = i->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword2);
00338         EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00339         if (ig) {  // defined inline
00340             g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ig);
00341             delete ig;
00342             if (!g) {
00343                 egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message4);
00344                 delete i;
00345                 return 0;
00346             }
00347         }
00348         else {  // defined via a name of a previously defined geometry
00349             string bgname;
00350             int err = i->getInput(eeg_keyword1,bgname);
00351             delete i;
00352             if (err) {
00353                 egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message5);
00354                 return 0;
00355             }
00356             g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(bgname);
00357             if (!g) {
00358                 egsWarning(eeg_message6,bgname.c_str());
00359                 return 0;
00360             }
00361         }
00362         vector<EnvelopeAux *> fgeoms;
00363         EGS_Input *ix;
00364         while ((ix = input->takeInputItem("inscribe in regions")) != 0) {
00365             vector<string> values;
00366             ix->getInput("inscribe in regions",values);
00367             if (values.size() < 2) egsWarning("createGeometry(envelope geometry):"
00368                                                   " %d inputs for 'inscribe in regions'? 2 or more are needed\n",values.size());
00369             else {
00370                 EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(values[0]);
00371                 if (!gj) {
00372                     egsWarning(eeg_message6,values[0].c_str());
00373                 }
00374                 else {
00375                     EnvelopeAux *aux = new EnvelopeAux;
00376                     aux->g = gj;
00377                     aux->nreg = values.size()-1;
00378                     aux->regs = new int [aux->nreg];
00379                     for (int j=0; j<aux->nreg; j++) {
00380                         aux->regs[j] = atoi(values[j+1].c_str());
00381                     }
00382                     fgeoms.push_back(aux);
00383                 }
00384             }
00385             delete ix;
00386         }
00387         if (fgeoms.size() > 0) {
00388             EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_FastEnvelope(g,fgeoms,"",indexing);
00389             result->setName(input);
00390             for (int j=0; j<fgeoms.size(); j++) {
00391                 delete fgeoms[j];
00392             }
00393             return result;
00394         }
00395 
00396         //
00397         // *** Inscribed geometries
00398         //
00399         i = input->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword3);
00400         vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> geoms;
00401         if (!i) {
00402             if (fgeoms.size()) {
00403                 egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message7);
00404             }
00405         }
00406         else {
00407             // first try for inscribed geometries defined inline
00408             while ((ig = i->takeInputItem(eeg_keyword2)) != 0) {
00409                 EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ig);
00410                 delete ig;
00411                 if (!gj) {
00412                     egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message8);
00413                 }
00414                 else {
00415                     geoms.push_back(gj);
00416                 }
00417             }
00418             // if geoms.size() is 0, check if inscribed geometries are defined
00419             // via names of previously defined geometries.
00420             if (!geoms.size()) {
00421                 vector<string> igeoms;
00422                 int err = i->getInput(eeg_keyword3,igeoms);
00423                 if (err || !igeoms.size()) {
00424                     egsWarning(eeg_message1,eeg_message7);
00425                 }
00426                 else {
00427                     for (unsigned int j=0; j<igeoms.size(); j++) {
00428                         EGS_BaseGeometry *gj =
00429                             EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(igeoms[j]);
00430                         if (!gj) {
00431                             egsWarning(eeg_message6,igeoms[j].c_str());
00432                         }
00433                         else {
00434                             geoms.push_back(gj);
00435                         }
00436                     }
00437                 }
00438             }
00439             delete i;
00440         }
00441         /*
00442         EGS_BaseGeometry *result = fgeoms.size() ?
00443             new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,fgeoms,geoms) :
00444             new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,geoms);
00445             */
00446         EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(g,geoms,"",indexing);
00447         result->setName(input);
00448         result->setLabels(input);
00449         return result;
00450 
00451     }
00452 
00453 
00454     void EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00455 
00456         // label defined in the envelope geometry
00457         g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00458 
00459         // label defined in the inscribed geometries
00460         vector<int> gregs;
00461         int shift=0;
00462         for (int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00463 
00464             // add regions from set geometries
00465             gregs.clear();
00466             if (geometries[i]) {
00467                 geometries[i]->getLabelRegions(str, gregs);
00468             }
00469 
00470             // shift region numbers according to indexing style
00471             if (new_indexing) {
00472                 shift = local_start[i];
00473             }
00474             else {
00475                 shift = nbase+i*nmax;
00476             }
00477             for (int j=0; j<gregs.size(); j++) {
00478                 gregs[j] += shift;
00479             }
00480 
00481             // add regions to the list
00482             regs.insert(regs.end(), gregs.begin(), gregs.end());
00483 
00484         }
00485 
00486         // label defined in self (envelope geometry input block)
00487         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00488 
00489     }
00490 
00491     void EGS_FastEnvelope::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00492 
00493         // label defined in the envelope geometry
00494         g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00495 
00496         // label defined in the inscribed geometries
00497         vector<int> gregs;
00498         int shift=0;
00499         for (int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00500 
00501             // add regions from set geometries
00502             gregs.clear();
00503             if (geometries[i]) {
00504                 geometries[i]->getLabelRegions(str, gregs);
00505             }
00506 
00507             // shift region numbers according to indexing style
00508             if (new_indexing) {
00509                 shift = local_start[i];
00510             }
00511             else {
00512                 shift = nmax;
00513             }
00514             for (int j=0; j<gregs.size(); j++) {
00515                 gregs[j] += shift;
00516             }
00517 
00518             // add regions to the list
00519             regs.insert(regs.end(), gregs.begin(), gregs.end());
00520 
00521         }
00522 
00523         // label defined in self (envelope geometry input block)
00524         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00525 
00526     }
